question: Where is the headquarters of central air command of Indian Airforce located?
explanation: The Central Air Command (CAC), Headquartered at Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh Eastern Air Command (EAC), Headquartered at Shillong, Meghalaya Southern Air Command (SAC), Headquartered at Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala South Western Air Command (SWAC), Headquartered at Gandhinagar, Gujarat Western Air Command (WAC), Headquartered at Subroto Park, New Delhi.
